title: Horrible Input Lag ( out of no where )
body: Hey guys, I recently developed a horrible Input Lag during game play. It started a few days ago out of no where and as far as I know nothing new has happen. I have reinstalled LoL, restarted the Router and nothing seems to be working.  Any help would be greatly appreciated. I can't play any champion with skill shots right now as Ezreal's Q is taking about 2 seconds to cast from input.

replies.body:
It sounds like you're experiencing high packet buffering. Since every action is sent as packets to the server, if they're delayed in reaching the server, it can delay the actions from actually taking place. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) provides some common solutions for this type of issue.

Let me know if those steps resolved this.
